title: Motley Fool Money: 08.28.2009
description: Is Apple working on a Kindle killer? What does an uptick in consumer spending mean for the market? Should investors bank on bank stocks?  In this installment of Motley Fool Money, we tackle those topics and share three stocks on our radar.
content:encoded: Is Apple working on a Kindle killer? What does an uptick in consumer spending mean for the market? Should investors bank on bank stocks?  In this installment of Motley Fool Money, we tackle those topics and share three stocks on our radar.
